incomeTaxNicYtd.description: Total of calculated Income Tax and National Insurance

incomeTaxNicDelta.description: Difference between the total of calculated Income Tax and National Insurance in this calculation and the previous calculation performed

crystallised.description: Indicates if the data represents the crystallised position for the Tax Year; if N then it is Year to Date

nationalRegime.description: This defines the national tax rates and rules to be applied. Values are UK and Scotland, May Change in future

totalTaxableIncome.description: Total Taxable Income. This is Total Income Received less the Total of Allowances and Deductions

taxableIncome.description: An object breaking down how taxable income is derived

totalIncomeTax.description: Total calculated Income Tax after allowances and reliefs

incomeTax.description: An object detailing the calculation of Income Tax

nic.description: An object detailing the calculation of National Insurance Contributions

eoyEstimate.description: An object containing end of year estimates

previousCalc.description: An object detailing the previous calculation (used to derive the delta calculation)
